title: Local Hour: Balks, Am I Right?
description:
Dan and the Shipping Container discuss the potential effects of Hurricane Ian across Florida and what we've experience thus far down south as everyone works from home. Plus, last night, Chris Cote's former high school teammate and current Miami Marlins pitcher Richard Bleier became the first pitcher since 1900 to balk three times in one at-bat. He joins the show for an exclusive look at his truly historic night.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
